summary: A small open source save manager, currently supports 9 saves.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes managing and loading your Skyrim saves much easier! The program is open source and currently supports up to 9 saves. It's Open Source! Simply open the main program (SSL.hta) with notepad. I wrote a HTA (Hyper Text Application) because it was easier and doesn't need compiling to run.

[heading]Installation:[/heading]
Installation is easy! Simply extract the contents of the folder to "Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim" (The default save location) and click the "Quick Installation" button. This will automatically create 9 folders, each with an empty "Saves" folder within it. Simply replace these empty folders with your other "Saves" folders. The character you are currently playing is Save 1, delete the "Saves" folder inside the folder named "1" and you're all set to use the program.

[heading]Updates:[/heading]
[b]Version 2.0:[/b]
[list][*]Added save tooltip (Appears when you mouseover button)[/*]
[*]Right click a button to set tooltip/info for that save[/*]
[/list][b]Version 1.0:[/b]
[list][*]Initial Release[/list]
author: Shadow
